title: Dude Wtf? Seriously In The Middle Of A Game??

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I was playing a game or league of legends, and all of a sudden my game disconnects. All to find out that It ends up saying the game is down for maintenance?!?? Dude wtf This is in the middle of a game why is this happening?

replies.body: Maintenance did take place for a bit, but it's usually to resolve an issue that doesn't lead to a bigger problem down the road. It shouldn't happen all the time and as of the now the issue has been fixed up! If you do run into any issues you can always reach out to me or my peers and we'll help you out.
